definition: Mt Tai 泰山[Tai4 Shan1] in Shandong/abbr. for Thailand
a type of standing harp, smaller than konghou 箜篌, with 5-25 strings
gun/firearm/rifle/spear/thing with shape or function similar to a gun/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3],桿|杆[gan3],條|条[tiao2],枝[zhi1]/to substitute for another person in a test/to knock/classifier for rifle shots

sentences.english: This is what they invented Tasers for.
sentences.chinese: 這就是他們爲什麼要發明泰瑟槍了。
